description: Gets information on the settings of query suggestions for an index. This is used to check the current settings applied to query suggestions. DescribeQuerySuggestionsConfig is currently not supported in the Amazon Web Services GovCloud (US-West) region.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index with query suggestions that you want to get information on.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: Whether query suggestions are currently in ENABLED mode or LEARN_ONLY mode.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Whether the status of query suggestions settings is currently ACTIVE or UPDATING.

nested_items.name: QueryLogLookBackWindowInDays
nested_items.description: How recent your queries are in your query log time window (in days).

nested_items.name: IncludeQueriesWithoutUserInformation
nested_items.description: TRUE to use all queries, otherwise use only queries that include user information to generate the query suggestions.

nested_items.name: MinimumNumberOfQueryingUsers
nested_items.description: The minimum number of unique users who must search a query in order for the query to be eligible to suggest to your users.

nested_items.name: MinimumQueryCount
nested_items.description: The minimum number of times a query must be searched in order for the query to be eligible to suggest to your users.

nested_items.name: LastSuggestionsBuildTime
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when query suggestions for an index was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastClearTime
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when query suggestions for an index was last cleared.

nested_items.name: TotalSuggestionsCount
nested_items.description: The current total count of query suggestions for an index.

nested_items.name: AttributeSuggestionsConfig
nested_items.description: Configuration information for the document fields/attributes that you want to base query suggestions on.

nested_items.name: SuggestableConfigList
nested_items.description: The list of fields/attributes that you want to set as suggestible for query suggestions.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the document field/attribute.

nested_items.name: Suggestable
nested_items.description: TRUE means the document field/attribute is suggestible, so the contents within the field can be used for query suggestions.

nested_items.name: AttributeSuggestionsMode
nested_items.description: The mode is set to either ACTIVE or INACTIVE. If the Mode for query history is set to ENABLED when calling UpdateQuerySuggestionsConfig and AttributeSuggestionsMode to use fields/attributes is set to ACTIVE, and you haven't set your SuggestionTypes preference to DOCUMENT_ATTRIBUTES, then Amazon Kendra uses the query history.
